Author: boieemassab
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Wow I can't find one thing negative about this project in these threads. Just endless row after row of post count padders with the usual one liner shilling. Why an ICO?.....hahahaha, with high purchase bonuses...hahahaha. Not a mention that this whole idea is lifted off of Piggycoin (PIG), a coin that has been running around 5 years. Nothing original at all. (oh yes a new name with a different game). Well I tell you all that you are certainly going to get schooled about crypto currency. Bitcointalk is sure losing it's validity in the space.  Want to teach your children? First teach yourself. Find a long term functional, trusted coin that retains it's value, with stable and gradual growth potential. Reward your child with that coin, so they may accrue value. Money isn't cute. Numismatics aside, it's cold, hard and ugly. Children like a gifted dollar bill as much as anybody, and it does not need Prime Minister Piglet's face on it.  Globalized family? That's some creepy buzzword.

Author: pigzbe
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: This has been a busy week at Pigzbe, with the team growing fast and the excitement of our token creation event (check our last blog for the full story on that) but we still found the time to sit down with our CTO Cat Le-Huy.  We asked Cat what was the most memorable and important part, for him, of  heading out to a country house and creating 675 million Wollo tokens on the Stellar Blockchain.  His answer might surprise you. He pointed us to this snippet of code:    Why?  Cat told us: "This link is super important. Because that’s what everyone will use to ensure that the WLO that they receive actually came from Pigzbe. This account is a *locked* account and proof that we can't create anymore Wollo. The home_domain shows people that we created it and is authentic."

Again great to see people are reading the articles about us 🐽🐽  Answers below:  (1) "They've wrapped it in initial coin nonsense, haven't they" No arguments, just negative vibe from the very beginning... It feels very unnecessary...  >> We're cool with it, it's great to be featured in the FT.🌈🚀  (2) “Daddy, how do I spend my Wallos?” Consults white paper, brow furrows I think that at the moment you are more focused on the pre-sale and ICO stages, but once these end you will also focus a lot more on providing resources such as these. Plus when Pigzbe will actually be bought, I am sure there will be a tutorial... Are you planning to release such materials by the way? 🙂  >>You are correct we are focussing on the pre-sale and ICO to ensure Pigzbe happens. Lots of exciting things planned for afterwards – the team we've assembled are all from design backgrounds – everything we do is going to be user driven, so tutorials, guides etc will all be happening!✅😃  (3) Regarding their criticism about the difficulty of purchasing Wollo tokens Will there be an easy fiat-Wollo gateway built into the app? Such that, for example, you could just connect your credit card and then you could purchase Wollo tokens. Or will it have to be done via an exchange?  >>The whole experience needs to be frictionless and it is our intention to build all of this into the Pigzbe App so you are absolutely on the right lines here – more details will be released in the coming months ✅  (4) The second is online, “through our website we facilitate buying things online in the real world”. Could you please elaborate on this point? What will you be able to buy through the website? I thought that the only gateway into the real world would be using the Wollo card...  >>Yes the card will act as a gateway to real world purchases but in addition to this we are exploring other ways in which Wollo could be spent – commercial partnerships through our website and digital products/services available through the Pigzbe App.  (5) Mr Yacob said the Switzerland-based company was in discussion with three card providers, and that he may have more to talk about in a few months time. Wonderful to see that Pigzbe is already in discussions! May I ask about how they went? 😄  >>All is good. Stay tuned for updates on this.👍  (6) Also this comment is ridiculous: "“Auntie, I've got this great new toy which you can use to send me pocket money. I just need a copy of your passport, and have you got a recent utility bill...”" How do you set up a bank account? 🤔🤔  >>Exactly right? We can and we will make the Pigzbe experience extremely easy and frictionless.😃👍  🐽🐽🐽

Author: aumusxou
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: ICO Analysis: Pigzbe Published on June 18, 2018 By Gerelyn Terzo  Team The management team boasts more than 150 years of combined experience across education products. Filippo Yacob, founder and CEO, is a Forbes 30-under-30 entrepreneur who also founded Primo Toys and coding toy Cubetto, which received accolades from Montessori. Pigzbe also boasts a team of advisors and investors, including Natale Ferrara, who is at the helm of ICO-Engine and Eidoo — the company behind the London cryptocurrency sculpture. Verdict Pigzbe is an ambitious project, as evidenced by its plans to replace the traditional piggy bank, but it’s also a promising one. Consider its ability to secure an early listing on leading cryptocurrency exchange Bitfinex, this project appears to have the wind at its back.  Traders are likely to find liquidity in the Wollo token. It’s disappointing that the Wollo token won’t be issued in the United States, as American children could benefit from financial learning and tools, but Pigzbe must be looking to avoid having the coin designated and regulated as a security. But given its mission to educate children about saving and spending in a hands-on way, the project is sure to strike a chord with families who are keen on decentralization and the blockchain around the world. Even if it doesn’t replace the piggy bank — which Pigzbe believes it should — the Wollo token could be used as an educational and fun tool for kids to learn about digital money. Familiarizing them with the blockchain and decentralization will introduce a whole new way of transacting that wasn’t available to previous generations. The cold storage is a nice touch that will teach kids early on that they need to secure their digital funds. Risks     One of the components of the Pigzbe ecosystem remains in development — the Wollo card for spending online and offline. While it’s only one of several moving parts to the Pigzbe project, we like to see completion. Any products that are dependent on the results of the token sale for the development add risk. -1     Cryptocurrencies haven’t officially made their way into the mainstream. Without regulation, the industry is still deemed risky by governments around the world, and therefore households may be reluctant to participate in a project that is built around the blockchain and cryptocurrencies, especially as it pertains to their children or a major life milestone like saving for college. -1.75 Growth Opportunity     Numbers don’t lie. Pigzbie boasts more than 20,500 Telegram members; 8,100-plus followers on Twitter; nearly 5,000 Facebook followers; nearly 2,600 subscribers. +2.5     Liquidity. In addition to Bitfinex, Wollo has also secured a listing on the Stellar Decentralized Exchange. +3     As the winner of an ICO race in Switzerland, Pigzbe was awarded most of a $1 million award in addition to the Bitfinex exchange listing. +2     A seasoned management team in education tech and electronics that combined has “shipped millions of products across more than 180 countries.” Founding members boast project experience with technology leaders including Apple, Google, Nokia, IBM and more. This kind of experience is hard to replicate at a startup. +3 Disposition Based on the above analysis, we reach a score of 7.25 out of 10 for the Pigzbe ICO. Proof: https://hacked.com/ico-analysis-pigzbe/

Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: https://ftalphaville.ft.com/2018/06/19/1529380800000/Is-Harry-Potter-on-the-dark-web--/  I have read through it and there are a few interesting points 😄  (1) "They've wrapped it in initial coin nonsense, haven't they"  No arguments, just negative vibe from the very beginning... It feels very unnecessary...  (2) “Daddy, how do I spend my Wallos?” Consults white paper, brow furrows  I think that at the moment you are more focused on the pre-sale and ICO stages, but once these end you will also focus a lot more on providing resources such as these. Plus when Pigzbe will actually be bought, I am sure there will be a tutorial... Are you planning to release such materials by the way? 🙂  (3) Regarding their criticism about the difficulty of purchasing Wollo tokens  Will there be an easy fiat-Wollo gateway built into the app? Such that, for example, you could just connect your credit card and then you could purchase Wollo tokens. Or will it have to be done via an exchange?  (4) The second is online, “through our website we facilitate buying things online in the real world”.  Could you please elaborate on this point? What will you be able to buy through the website? I thought that the only gateway into the real world would be using the Wollo card...  (5) Mr Yacob said the Switzerland-based company was in discussion with three card providers, and that he may have more to talk about in a few months time.  Wonderful to see that Pigzbe is already in discussions! May I ask about how they went? 😄  (6) Also this comment is ridiculous: "“Auntie, I've got this great new toy which you can use to send me pocket money. I just need a copy of your passport, and have you got a recent utility bill...”"  How do you set up a bank account? 🤔🤔  ------ I have also put it on Telegram and gotten an answer, but decided to share my thoughts here too!

The remaining tokens will be held by the company, split into a founders pool (14.8% or 100 million tokens), a service providers pool (75 million or 11.1%), an M&A pool (1.9% or 12.5 million), a partnerships and advisors pool (1.9% or 12.5 million).

Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Pigzbe is an educational product focused on the family-tech and ed-tech markets, and the safety of families is key. One mechanism to enable this is to ensure that the primary account holder has the greatest view and control over who is interacting with their children, whilst also ensuring the delivery of a swift, fun and dynamic experience. A ‘family network’ is created when a primary adult account holder and an associated child’s account are created. The primary account holder controls membership to the group and associates these memberships to the child’s account.

Author: cryptonite04
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: We’re reinventing the piggy-bank by transforming it into a piggy-wallet. Think of Pigzbe as a tool to support parents in teaching children the principles of earning, saving and managing money in an exciting and non-threatening way, while providing them with an entry point into the world of cryptocurrencies. the future of cryptocurrencies is here people...because now everything about crypto can be learned since childhood.

Author: cryptonite04
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: The app serves as your child’s first wallet, represented by an immersive, intuitive and nonverbal world where children can play, explore and learn. The more Wollo children save, the more engaging the world becomes, which encourages positive earning, saving and spending habits. The wallet itself is managed by the parent. It operates as a secure portal and allows parents to create a network of trusted family members, capable of sending funds to the child’s environment as gifts, recurring allowances and rewards for completing tasks and chores.the child learnes to store save and value the hardearned tokens as we used to do with fiats since childhood.

Author: pigzbe
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Thank you all for the fantastic support and feedback!  Here is a collection of our blogposts on Medium, some are from our team founders and others from advisors.  All our blog post are available on our Medium publication https://medium.com/pigzbe  Happy reading!  1. The piggy bank was a great idea, but it’s had its day. Discover how PIgzbe is giving pocket money a new life: https://medium.com/@pigzbe/why-a-piggy-wallet-will-teach-your-kids-more-about-money-than-a-piggy-bank-bc9b135e99f1  2. Read Cat Le-Huy's insightful article It's time for blockchain to meet its public and let us know your thoughts! 👉 http://bit.ly/2y9vn5I  3. Discover why today’s banks struggle with micro transfers, and what Yannick Naud, Pigzbe's Economics Advisor, and founder, identifies as a solution to this. 👉https://buff.ly/2xbV70x  4. "The token economy embodies the 21st-century approach to communities; how they share, exchange value, and obtain the products and services they want."  Read about why Wollo is a token of strength http://bit.ly/2l8sjx2  5.  “Kids have amazingly open minds. They can understand things in a way that adults sometimes can’t. But they need something to interact with.” Read more on How Pigzbe is designed to introduce families to blockchain without them ever realising  👉  https://bit.ly/2MmIT93   🐽🐽🐽

Author: pigzbe
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Thanks for the comment MountianConqueror!  Let me tackle this one in few points:  Are kids playing with Crypto? No, we created Pigzbe to give an extremely easy entry point into the world of cryptocurrencies, for both parents and children. Pigzbe is a financial literacy product, as opposed to a savings product, where children and parents can enjoy a deeply educational experience without having to invest much. Any fluctuation in the price of Wollo won’t actually affect the gaming experience, or the learning.  I don’t get it, why should kids learn this? Educating children about money needs to start early. Studies show that, one in four students struggles with the simplest of financial responsibilities. Check out the OECD for more on that: http://www.oecd.org/newsroom/many-teenagers-struggle-to-understand-money-matters.htm Pigzbe is trying to prepare children for the financial system of the future. Cryptocurrencies are something no parent can afford to ignore if they want their children to have a good grip on the modern financial system.  Could kids be scammed? is this secure enough? The Pigzbe device for kids is only a game controller and notifier. The parent is the primary account holder and the Pigzbe DApp is designed from the ground up to be secure. If you want to read more about the security aspect, please refer to our White Paper here https://pigzbe.com/pdf/pigzbe_whitepaper.pdf  🐽🐽🐽

Author: Zebra#
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Here is additional information on the Pigzbe hardware from their whitepaper: https://pigzbe.com/pdf/pigzbe_whitepaper.pdf  "The Pigzbe wallet PCB features Espressif’s ESP32-D2WD, a highly integrated WiFi &  Bluetooth system-on-chip with a dual-core processor and advanced security  features.  At scheduled intervals, the wallet will connect to authorised WiFi networks and poll the  Pigzbe server for notifications, ensuring fully independent operation without a mobile  device present. All connections to the notification server are secured using HTTPS.    System configuration (including the authorisation of new WiFi networks) may be  carried out over Bluetooth from the Pigzbe mobile application. The hardware takes  advantage of LE Secure Connections (introduced in Bluetooth 4.2) to ensure an  authenticated and secure connection between the Pigzbe wallet and the mobile  device, using the LED matrix to support the Numeric Comparison association model.   Two buttons and a 6-axis motion sensor enable interaction with the wallet, while a  miniature speaker, vibration motor and a matrix of 192 LEDs provide engaging and  varied feedback. Ultra low power sleep modes conserve battery life while the device  is not in use.  The Pigzbe wallet is built to meet the needs of users across all age groups. The speed  of the processor allows us to create fluid and engaging animations and audio for  younger children.  When configured as a cold storage wallet for adults, the cryptographic hardware  acceleration offered by the ESP32 allows us to provide industry-leading security  features necessary to safely store and transfer coins.  In all modes of use, the contents of the flash memory are encrypted using AES-256.  All application code must also be signed by the Pigzbe remote server, ensuring that  only trusted software can run on the device. This feature enables us to offer remote  firmware upgrades without compromising the security of the device.  Each component used in the Pigzbe wallet has been selected to ensure reliable,  long-term operation, from the LEDs down to the supporting passive components.  Each electronic prototype is assembled here in London by our experienced design  team, allowing us to rapidly iterate and test new designs before committing to mass  production."

Author: Zebra#
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: The Pink Pigzbe is for children:  "It acts as a notifier and game controller that connects with the app and  engages children in a rich dialogue with Pigzbe through sound, haptics, and visuals  that enhance the saving and learning experience by taking it out of the screen and  into the real world. As children outgrow the app, the device works as a well-designed  and secure cold storage wallet comparable to industry standard devices like Trezor  or Ledger in build, quality, and safety."  The black Pigzbe is for parents to hold Wollo tokens in cold storage. Again, it is comparable to industry standard devices like Trezor  or Ledger.

Author: Zebra#
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Here are the user functionality details to give you an idea of how the Pigzbe ecosystem works in regards to the pink and black units:   Primary user (Pigzbe Black) ● Pigzbe account creation  ● Pigzbe hardware unit configuration  ● Add children  ● Invite family members  ● View all overall and individual balances and exchange value  ● View notifications  ● Send/receive Wollo  ● Set tasks for children  ● Set up recurring allowance for children   Child (Pigzbe Pink) ● View own balance  ● View exchange value of balance  ● View and complete tasks  ● View notifications  ● Receive Wollo ● Game Controller  Family member (Optional: Additional Black Pigzbe) ● View own balance and exchange value  ● View child balances  ● View notifications  ● Send/receive Wollo  ● Set tasks for children  ● Set up recurring allowance for children

Author: Zebra#
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: And just to be clear, the physical Pigzbe Pink and Black units only make up part of the ecosystem.  In addition to the digital wallets there is also an educational app:  "The app serves as your child’s first wallet, represented by an immersive, intuitive and  nonverbal world where children can play, explore and learn. The more Wollo children  save, the more engaging the world becomes, which encourages positive earning,  saving and spending habits."  And let's not forget about Wollo (the reason most of us investors are here)  "Wollo is the Pigzbe network’s native token. It allows parents and families to make  transfers big and small securely and internationally within seconds. Wollo is the token  that allows our microfinancing family networks to form and function, and, because  networks need tokens to access the gaming experience, the more users there are in  the world, and the bigger each family network is, the more demand for the token  there will be on the open market."

Author: Gustafio
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Cool! I never knew redbull was posting tech news on their website   Favorite quote from the interview:  Where did the idea for Pigzbe come from?  "I was thinking about my four-year-old son and his future. One day I noticed him talking to my own father on Skype. My father was holding a 2p coin up to the camera: “Your mummy tells me you’ve been helpful recently, and kind to your baby brother. You see this coin? When I come to London next month, I’ll give it to you for being such a good boy. We can put it in with all your other coins, and maybe we can go buy some Lego!” It occurred to me that physical money, especially in its smallest denominations, just isn’t useful for globalised families who communicate digitally."

Author: CryptoTee
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Hey Rockstar$ great Sunday Funday To You All. My friends out here in LinkedIn. I want to share a project with you all as most of you here connected with me are parents or maybe going to be parents, Either way we know how important our children are to us. This project will help not just our kids but us adults as well. Can you remember growing up when we use have a piggy bank in our bedrooms and drop coins in them to save up for something right and in a way it helped self educate the children into saving as they get older. Past and present we see it now where no where in the curriculum do you see really a course or a beginner's guide into educating our children about finances.  But now my friends we have a resource that we can use to help us as parents do exactly that (educate Our Children) it's important to start them early my friends and here in today's date and with the way crypto currency is moving fast along side with blockchain technology we can't afford to be left behind and for our children's sake cause we know they deserve better.   Don't worry it's coming, I know you're anxious to find out what I'm about to share with you and talking about as well.

Author: cryptomoon1004
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Families have always given children with a small sums to children... Till the time the world uses fiat currency, handing over $1 or $5 or $10 paper bills to your children as a pocket money per day or per week is okay and there is no necessity for a piggy wallet.... But the world will change in few years, and we wont have fiat money anymore in the world...  With bitcoin continuously increasing in value and popularity, an average Joe (irrespective of the fact whether he is interested in cryptos or not) will take money from his bank and put that into cryptos... Ultimately, Joe's friends and neighbors will do the same.  And so on and so forth, everyone will do it - one by one.... Bitcoin is like a magnet and will attract everyone into the ecosystem sooner or later.... Ofcourse, initially people will put part of their money into bitcoin say 5 to 10% of their money into cryptos, but eventually with government regulation kicking in, and so many more things that may happen (say : Merchant adoption) that will make the same Joe increase his % portfolio into cryptos. from a small 5 % to 50% and the cycle will continue... Also, note that the dips in crypto price becomes an opportunity for Joe to increase his holdings into cryptos, so that will make him invest more money (p.s. fiat money) into cryptos every time the market goes down - ultimately making him go cashless and all into digital money / virtual currencies..   Whenever the world goes fiat, traditional piggy wallet for kids will loose a market and will eventually need an alternative... Pigzbe can be a good alternative ! Pigzbe can be the best alternative that time.... or let me say - " Pigzbe can be the only alternative that time "

Pigzbe beta app released June 2018 : Pigzbe mobile application and game released to the public.   Public token sale June 2018: Wollo public launch, crowd-sale and token distribution.   Manufacturing ramp up June - December 2018: Ramp up to mass manufacturing through EVT and DVT runs.   Game development July - December 2018: Continuous game development/testing released iteratively.   Exchange listing August 2018: Wollo token made tradable through key exchanges globally.   Device certification Jan – March 2019: Device tested & certified ahead of distribution to launch regions.   ICO units delivery April - June 2019: All ICO purchases and pre-sale units are shipped to the public.   Retail launch (UK, JP) Q3 - Q4 2019: Official product launch through selected retailers for first season.   Global expansion (US, KR) 2020: Operation scale-up and localisation to additional regions

Author: pigzbe
Title: [ANN][ICO] PIGZBE - BLOCKCHAIN PIGGY-WALLET FOR KIDS & FAMILIES 🐽🐽🐽
Body: Pigzbe is a part physical, part digital piggy-wallet for children, powered by Wollo, a family-friendly cryptocurrency.  Pigzbe uses the blockchain to make money transfers within families borderless, safe, and instant. By unlocking the potential of globalised families as micro-financing networks, Pigzbe teaches children about money in the 21st century.  Pigzbe is made up of 4 elements:  👍 Wollo (WLO) - A utility token that enables saving, learning, playing and spending.  💰 Wallet - An app and game for families and children that lets you manage your Wollo.  🕹 Pigzbe - A tangible controller and cold storage device that interacts with the app and game.    💳  Wollo Card - A payment card that allows families to spend Wollo in multiple currencies.   🐽🐽🐽 KEY DATES 🐽🐽🐽  Some key dates below:  👉ICO Starts 4th of July, 12 midday GMT 👉ICO finishes 11th of July, 12 midday GMT  ✅Details about minimum limits  will follow when our  ICO webpage is published shortly.  🐽Following conclusion of the ICO Pigzbe devices will be available to buy from this July, with first deliveries commencing in Q2 2019.   🐽🐽🐽LEARN MORE 🐽🐽🐽  🖥 Watch the video at: https://youtu.be/uX6cEah5Fcs  💡Website is now live at: https://www.pigzbe.com  🔦 Review the Whitepaper at: https://pigzbe.com/pdf/pigzbe_whitepaper.pdf   🐽🐽🐽JOIN COMMUNITY🐽🐽🐽  TELEGRAM https://t.me/pigzbeico FACEBOOK https://www.facebook.com/pigzbe/ TWITTER https://twitter.com/pigzbe REDDIT https://www.reddit.com/user/pigzbe/ MEDIUM https://medium.com/pigzbe INSTAGRAM https://www.instagram.com/pigzbe/ YOUTUBE https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCupouccp5g20d2JPaLrVBnw LINKEDIN https://www.linkedin.com/company/pigzbe/
